data.field: The coolest language ever. I may never go outside again. Like Perl5, only slicker. Whatever I configure it to be. My own private Perl. Even more annoying to uptight language grannies. Something I worry about when it arrives. The leverage Parrot needs to conquer the world. A mixed bag. Some ideas I love, some I fear. Frustrating; I've worked hard to learn Perl 5, dang it! Finished just in time to teach to my grandkids. Like APL, only not as easy to read. Hmm... where's the ∌ key? Perl's downfall. Woe! Despair! None of the above; see my rant below. I'm waiting to hear what paco thinks.
